name.baseName: Printing ; Printing and dyeing linen ; Hemp cloth type ; Batik printing ; All sizes; NESPS2
印花 ; 印染麻布类 ; 麻布类 ; 蜡染印花 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management91.28，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management91.28，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表了适用于纺织行业各个规模的麻布类蜡染印花工艺。该蜡染印花工艺以其复杂的图案和对染料的抗性而闻名，用于制作具有独特美感的图案服装和装饰性织物。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码17,三级代码173.0,四级代码1733文件，在完整版文件中第233页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为印染麻布类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90.06
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+化学处理法，其效率为90.06，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management88.41
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为88.41，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management93.69，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment equipment (kWh/year) / (rated power of wastewater treatment equipment (kW) × operating time of wastewater treatment equipment (hours/year))
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+化学处理法，其效率为93.69，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85.45
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为85.45，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87.23
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+化学处理法，其效率为87.23，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management79.76
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为79.76，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为91.28，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
